column2: ENGLISH
Form a New Empire

Create a custom [This.EMF_GetCustomEmpireTitularDeJure]. It will retain your current coat of arms (title flag) and have a similar map color as your current primary kingdom title, among other dynamically-derived properties relating to the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].
Form a New Kingdom

Create a custom [This.EMF_GetCustomKingdomTitularDeJure]. It will retain your current coat of arms (title flag) and have a similar map color as your current primary duchy title, among other dynamically-derived properties relating to the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].
Form the Holy Roman Empire
Reclaim Charlemagne's legacy as the protector of Rome and found the Holy Roman Empire.
Form the Saint-Empire Romain
Reclaim Charlemagne's legacy as the protector of Rome and found the Saint-Empire Romain, a western/frankish/latin alternative Holy Roman Empire.
Create the Hansa
Become Prince Mayor of the Merchant League of the Hansa.
column3: Devenir le Prince Maire de la ligue marchande de la Hanse.
column6: Sé alcalde príncipe de la Liga comercial de la Hansa

column2: Create the Swiss Confederation
Become Prince of the new Swiss Confederation.
column3: Devenir le Prince de la Confédération suisse.
column4: Werdet der Prinz der Schweizerischen Eidgenossenschaft
column6: Se príncipe de la nueva confederación suiza.

column2: Restore Byzantium
Restore the Byzantine Empire. The Roman Empire shall not be forgotten by history!
and titular empire
and, depending upon any de jure kingdoms in which you completely control all counties (baron-tier doesn't matter), a potentially de jure empire
and titular kingdom
and, depending upon any de jure duchies in which you completely control all counties (baron-tier doesn't matter), a potentially de jure kingdom
